import React from 'react' import NavBar from './Navbar/NavBar' import './CSS/Projects.css' import Folder from './Navbar/icons/project.png' import { useState } from 'react' import {Animated} from 'react-animated-css' import Arrow from './CSS/img/arrow.png' import dropDown from './Images/dropdown.png' import shelterPage from './Images/shelterpage.png' import volPage from './Images/volpage.png' const Projects = () => { const [projectOne, setprojectOne] = useState(true) const [projectTwo, setprojectTwo] = useState(false) const [slideOne, setslideOne] = useState(true) const [slideTwo, setslideTwo] = useState(false) const [slideThree, setslideThree] = useState(false) const [slideFour, setslideFour] = useState(false) const [projectOneBool, setProjectOneBool] = useState(true) const [projectTwoBool, setProjectTwoBool] = useState(false) const [viewCount, setViewCount] = useState(0) // const [projectThreeBool, setProjectThreeBool] = useState(false) const LeftArrowHandler = () => { if(projectOneBool) { if(viewCount === 3){ setViewCount(2) setslideFour(false) setslideThree(true) } else if(viewCount === 2){ setViewCount(1) setslideThree(false) setslideTwo(true) } else if(viewCount === 1){ setViewCount(0) setslideTwo(false) setslideOne(true) } } } const RightArrowHandler = () => { if(projectOneBool) { if(viewCount === 0){ setViewCount(1) setslideTwo(true) setslideOne(false) } else if(viewCount === 1){ setViewCount(2) setslideTwo(false) setslideThree(true) } else if(viewCount === 2){ setViewCount(3) setslideThree(false) setslideFour(true) } } } return (

{ projectOne?slideOne?

Pet Party

Pet Shelter and Volunteer Database

Current Work In Progress

Website for pet shelters and volunteer's alike. Helps Sheter to be able to easily search for volunteer's available in their city in case they need more help. in the long term it will have file-uploading for applications as well as a list of registred volunteer's that have been approved to help per shelter

    Languages Used

  • JavaScript
  • HTML5
  • Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)

    Frameworks and Library's

  • React
  • Express

    Database

  • MongoDB
  • Mongoose

    Other Technologies Used

  • Google Maps(Geocoded address api calls for lat and lng)
  • Node.Js
  • Axios
: "" : "" } { projectOne?slideTwo?

    Features and Technologies

  • Api generated state and city dropdown using JQuery and Ajax
  • Styling done with CSS
  • Can toggle form with the use of volunteer and shelter tabs
  • hyperlink styled button swtiches between login and registration
  • http only cookie created upon login or registration using JWT-Web-Tokens
: "" : "" } { projectOne?slideThree?

    Features and Technologies

  • Google Map Integration
  • Map latitude and longitude generated from google api call from user's registered address
  • Use of Http Only Cookies to verify website access
  • Log out link to clear logged in cookie
: "" : "" } { projectOne?slideFour?

    Features and Technologies

  • Google Map Integration
  • Map latitude and longitude generated from google api call from user's registered address
  • Use of Http Only Cookies to verify website access
